```{r cars}
fizzBuzz <- function(fizz = 7, buzz = 11) {
  numbers <- 1:100
  # ...because vectors can't mix types, and "fizz" is a character
  returnThis <- as.character(numbers)
  names(returnThis) <- numbers
  
  # fizz
  whichFizz <- (numbers %% fizz) == 0
  returnThis[whichFizz] <- "fizz"
  
  # buzz
  whichBuzz <- (numbers %% buzz) == 0
  returnThis[whichBuzz] <- "buzz"
  
  # fizzBuzz
  fizzBuzz <- fizz*buzz
  whichFB <- (numbers %% fizzBuzz) == 0
  returnThis[whichFB] <- "fizzbuzz"
  
  return(returnThis)
}

fizzBuzz()
```
